product_overview: A personal portfolio built with Next.js App Router featuring responsive sections, custom typography, GSAP scroll animations, and a modern tech stack for showcasing personal skills and projects.
core_goals: Create a visually appealing and responsive personal portfolio website.
Showcase key sections: Hero, About, Skills, Projects, and Contact with smooth animations.
Implement custom typography with JetBrains Mono font for consistent branding.
Leverage Next.js features for optimal performance and SEO.
Use GSAP ScrollTrigger for scroll-based animations that enhance user engagement.
key_features: Responsive layout with clearly defined sections for portfolio content.
Custom typography using JetBrains Mono font loaded via next/font.
GSAP ScrollTrigger animations on section titles and content triggered on scroll.
Next.js App Router architecture for scalable and maintainable routing.
SEO and metadata configuration in root layout for improved discoverability.
NPM-based setup and build process with automation for deployment.
user_flow_summary: User visits the portfolio landing page (Hero section).
User scrolls down to view the About section detailing personal background.
User continues to scroll to Skills section showcasing technical expertise.
User explores the Projects section to review portfolio work.
User navigates to Contact section to reach out or connect.
Throughout scrolling, animations reveal content for enhanced engagement.
validation_criteria: The portfolio should render correctly across different screen sizes and devices.
GSAP ScrollTrigger animations must trigger smoothly without performance degradation.
All portfolio sections (Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Contact) must be accessible and visually distinct.
Custom font JetBrains Mono must load correctly without errors on all supported browsers.
The site metadata should be correctly set and verifiable via SEO tools.
Build and deployment process should complete without errors, including type checks and linting.
No usage of deprecated dependencies or warnings during installation and build.

features.name: portfolio-readme-highlights
features.description: README documents a Next.js App Router portfolio with responsive sections (Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Contact), custom typography, and npm-based setup.

features.name: root-layout-font-and-metadata
features.description: Root layout loads JetBrains Mono via next/font with the --font-montreal-mono CSS variable and defines site metadata for the portfolio.

features.name: section-reveal-scroll-animations
features.description: useSectionReveal registers GSAP ScrollTrigger to animate title and content elements on scroll and refreshes the plugin during cleanup.

features.name: next-server-manifest-metadata
features.description: Build artifacts include server reference manifest JSON with encryption key metadata.

features.name: next-build-trace-records
features.description: Trace file captures Next.js build and bundling timing events for client, server, and edge pipelines.
